content:
github-actions[bot] commented on issue #3456:

cc @peterhuene

  • peterhuene: wasmtime:api

adamrk commented on issue #3456:

@alexcrichton I guess it makes sense for you to review because you put up the issue?

alexcrichton commented on issue #3456:

Thanks for this! Given that Linker does the automatic translation from set-of-items to instance though would it be possible to make the error message a bit smarter and look for the item that's not actually defined? That I think would produce the best error message to indicate what precisely is missing.

adamrk commented on issue #3456:

No problem, changed it to have foo::bar matching the error without linking.
